attributes.action: Award a postumas medal for the actions of pc Bill Barker who died protecting his local community and paid the ultimate sacrifice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that a medal should be awarded to the familey of pc Bill mBarker in honour of his commitment to his local community that conclueded in him paying the ultimate sacrifice

rejection.details:
Your petition is similar to a petition already on the website. 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Cockermouth

The Cabinet Office is also actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
